verses.plain: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.

tokens.t: Unto thee, O
, do I lift up my soul.

verses.plain: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.

tokens.t: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.

verses.plain: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.

tokens.t: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.

verses.plain: Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.

tokens.t: Shew me thy ways, O
; teach me thy paths.

verses.plain: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.

tokens.t: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou
the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.

verses.plain: Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.

tokens.t: Remember, O
, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they
ever of old.

verses.plain: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O LORD.

tokens.t: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O

verses.plain: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.

tokens.t: Good and upright
the
: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.

verses.plain: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

tokens.t: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

verses.plain: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.

tokens.t: All the paths of the
mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.

verses.plain: For thy name’s sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.

tokens.t: For thy name’s sake, O
, pardon mine iniquity; for it
great.

verses.plain: What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.

tokens.t: What man
he that feareth the
? him shall he teach in the way
he shall choose.

verses.plain: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.

tokens.t: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.

verses.plain: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.

tokens.t: The secret of the
with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.

verses.plain: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.

tokens.t: Mine eyes
ever toward the
; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.

verses.plain: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.

tokens.t: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I
desolate and afflicted.

verses.plain: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.

tokens.t: The troubles of my heart are enlarged:
bring thou me out of my distresses.

verses.plain: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.

tokens.t: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.

verses.plain: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.

tokens.t: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.

verses.plain: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.

tokens.t: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.

verses.plain: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.

tokens.t: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.

verses.plain: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.

tokens.t: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.

footnotes.text: and…: or, and his covenant to make them know it
